s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT CABLE FROM NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten2.ptxt: Wait at least 90 seconds after disconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal to prevent airbag activation.

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the accelerator pedal position sensor connector.
Remove the 2 bolts and accelerator pedal rod.

item.ptxt: Do not drop or strike the accelerator pedal rod.
Do not disassemble the accelerator pedal rod.
This accelerator pedal does not require lubrication.
Do not apply oil or other lubrication to the accelerator pedal rod.
If applied, the accelerator pedal rod must be replaced.
